<title level="1" right="Trait">[Monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Abilities with this trait are from the [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) class. A weapon with this trait is primarily used by monks.
name: Monk
